span.a: Governor Kate Brown Announces Statewide that in-person learning would not commence for the remainder of this school year

h2.style: font-size: large; color: rgb(41, 41, 41); font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; text-align: center;
h2.span: This page is to support the sharing of information and communication to Central School District families and communities relating to the coronavirus which causes an infection called COVID-19. The district is closely monitoring reports from the Governor's Office, the Oregon Health Authority, and the Oregon Department of Education. We will continue to update this page with information and resources as necessary.
